author: William A. Galston
title: Trump Courts Disaster With Iran
text:
In a speech at the Heritage Foundation earlier this week, Secretary of State Mike Pompeo laid out the Trump administration’s conditions for a new deal with Iran. These conditions include not only the permanent cessation of Iran’s nuclear and ballistic missile programs but also the complete reversal of decades of Iranian regional policy. It is inconceivable that Tehran would agree to anything of the sort, which points to the real objective of the administration’s policy—regime change.
Indeed, Mr. Pompeo said as much: He noted...
